remarks: An equality that holds when ` X ` , ` Y ` , ` Z ` are independent (non-colinear) vectors.  Subtraction version of first equation of part (5) in [Baer] p. 46.  TODO:  This is the subtraction version, may not be needed.  TODO: delete if ~ baerlem5abmN is used.  (Contributed by NM, 24-May-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
baerlem3.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
baerlem3.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
baerlem3.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
baerlem3.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
baerlem3.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
baerlem3.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
baerlem3.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
baerlem3.c $e |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( N ` { Y , Z } ) ) $.
baerlem3.d $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { Y } ) =/= ( N ` { Z } ) ) $.
baerlem3.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
baerlem3.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
baerlem5a.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
baerlem5amN $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { ( X .- ( Y .- Z ) ) } ) = ( ( ( N ` { ( X .- Y ) } ) .(+) ( N ` { Z } ) ) i^i ( ( N ` { ( X .+ Z ) } ) .(+) ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) ) $.
